page.description: The Grid Builder's Xbasic Functions pane is where you can add functions to handle Ajax Callbacks or user-defined functions for use in server-side Xbasic event handlers.

discussion.p: The Xbasic Functions pane can be used to define server-side functions that can be called from Xbasic event handlers. You can also define functions that handle Ajax Callbacks here.

description.p: There are two tabs on the Xbasic functions pane. *[ui:Xbasic]*, where you define your Xbasic functions, and *[ui:Interactive Window]*. The *[ui:Interactive Window]* tab is the same as the Interactive Window found elsewhere in Alpha Anywhere and can be used to test Xbasic scripts.
